| record
	[FIRSTNAME, VALUE]
	["Aurora", 11]
	["Aurora", 22]
	["Aurora", 33]
	["Hera", 77]
	["Hera", 66]
	["Hera", 55]
	["Hera", 44]
| aggregate 
	by=[FIRSTNAME]      
	count() 			# Aurora: 3  / Hera: 4
	SUM=sum(VALUE)		# Aurora: 66  / Hera: 242
	MIN=min(VALUE)		# Aurora: 11  / Hera: 44
	MAX=max(VALUE)		# Aurora: 33  / Hera: 77
	FIRST=first(VALUE) 	# Aurora: 11  / Hera: 77
	LAST=last(VALUE)	# Aurora: 33  / Hera: 44  
| sort FIRSTNAME
